meanings.definition: The act or process of congealing.
meanings.sent1: The congealment of the jelly was fascinating to watch.
meanings.sent2: The congealment of the ice cream made it hard to scoop.
meanings.sent3: The congealment of the pudding turned it into a wobbly treat.
meanings.sent4: The congealment of the lava created a solid rock formation.
meanings.sent5: The congealment of the glue made it stick firmly.

meanings.sent1: The congealment of the soup made it look unappetizing.
meanings.sent2: The congealment of the blood indicated a serious injury.
meanings.sent3: The congealment of the candle wax formed interesting shapes.
meanings.sent4: The congealment of the sauce turned it into a thick paste.
meanings.sent5: The congealment of the water in the pipes caused a blockage.
